categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shivanek was a Sith captain who lived during the Cold War. He was killed by an elite Republic strike team.

Captain Shivanek was a Sith captain who had been stationed at the Sith base on Taral V during the Cold War. He, along with his pet beast Ripper, were killed by an elite four man strike team that had been sent by Jedi Master Oteg to recover a Gree computer that was needed in order to rescue a Jedi Master being held prisoner by the Sith Empire in The Maelstrom. He had red markings on his armor, showing his allegiance to the Sith Empire.
